description: This file defines a React component for an upload page in a web application. It includes form handling, state management, and UI layout for uploading or simulating the upload of documents related to exams or subjects.

methods.name: sleep
methods.description: Asynchronous helper function that returns a Promise resolving after a specified number of milliseconds.

methods.name: UploadPage
methods.description: React functional component managing the upload form UI, state, and mock submission logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, validates form data, simulates a delay, and randomly injects an error to demonstrate error handling.
